/*ChargCalculationResultMapper.getChargePersonCountList*/
SELECT A.SO_ID ,(SELECT SO_NM FROM TSYCO_SO_MAST WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID) AS SO_NM /* 사업 */ ,(SELECT PROD_NM FROM TPMPD_PROD WHERE PROD_CD = A.PROD_CD AND SO_ID = A.SO_ID) AS PROD_NM /* 상품명 */ ,A.CUST_CNT /* 고객수 */ ,A.CTRT_CNT /* 계약건수 */ ,A.PROD_CMPS_CNT /* 계약상품건수 */ ,A.SVC_CMPS_CNT /* 계약서비스건수 */ ,A.USE_AMT /* 이용금액 */ ,A.USE_QTY ,A.USE_CNT FROM (SELECT B.PROD_CD , A.SO_ID , COUNT(DISTINCT A.CUST_ID ) AS CUST_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT A.CTRT_ID ) AS CTRT_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT A.PROD_CMPS_ID) AS PROD_CMPS_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT A.SVC_CMPS_ID ) AS SVC_CMPS_CNT , TRUNCATE(SUM(A.USE_AMT), 0) AS USE_AMT , TRUNCATE(SUM(A.USE_QTY), 0) AS USE_QTY , TRUNCATE(SUM(A.USE_CNT), 0) AS USE_CNT FROM TBLCH_CHRG A , TCMCT_PROD_CMPS_INFO B WHERE 1=1
AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} /* INPUT '16' */
AND A.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} /* INPUT '201710'*/
AND A.SO_ID = B.SO_ID AND A.CTRT_ID = B.CTRT_ID AND A.PROD_CMPS_ID = B.PROD_CMPS_ID AND B.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' GROUP BY B.PROD_CD, A.SO_ID) A WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY SO_NM, PROD_NM

/*ChargCalculationResultMapper.totalCount 요금계산결과현황*/ SELECT COUNT(A.CUST_CNT) FROM (SELECT B.PROD_CD , A.SO_ID , COUNT(DISTINCT A.CUST_ID ) AS CUST_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT A.CTRT_ID ) AS CTRT_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT A.PROD_CMPS_ID) AS PROD_CMPS_CNT , COUNT(DISTINCT A.SVC_CMPS_ID ) AS SVC_CMPS_CNT , TRUNCATE(SUM(A.USE_AMT), 0) AS USE_AMT , TRUNCATE(SUM(A.USE_QTY), 0) AS USE_QTY , TRUNCATE(SUM(A.USE_CNT), 0) AS USE_CNT FROM TBLCH_CHRG A , TCMCT_PROD_CMPS_INFO B WHERE 1=1
AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} /* INPUT '16' */
AND A.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} /* INPUT '201710'*/
AND A.SO_ID = B.SO_ID AND A.CTRT_ID = B.CTRT_ID AND A.PROD_CMPS_ID = B.PROD_CMPS_ID AND B.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' GROUP BY B.PROD_CD, A.SO_ID) A WHERE 1 = 1
